meanings.sent1: The coadjutrices helped the teacher organize the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The coadjutrices supported the nurse in caring for the patients.
meanings.sent3: The coadjutrices playfully raced to see who could finish their tasks first.
meanings.sent4: The coadjutrices were the backbone of the team, always ready to lend a hand.
meanings.sent5: The coadjutrices' dedication and hard work were truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Women who assist in a religious community.
meanings.sent1: The coadjutrices at the monastery helped with daily chores and rituals.
meanings.sent2: The coadjutrices prayed together in the chapel every morning.
meanings.sent3: The coadjutrices shared a laugh as they prepared for the upcoming ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The coadjutrices' presence in the convent brought a sense of peace and harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coadjutrices' devotion to their faith was evident in all their actions.
